169390.<pc>は 万象流転の書を読んだ。\n<br>\nしかし 本には なにも書かれて:
read the The Book of All Things.
But there was nothing inside the book!

169391.<pc>は 万象流転の書を読んだ。\n<br>\n救いをもたらす おおいなるチカ:
read The Book of All Things.
Those who seek the great power of salvation must chant the sacred text of beginnings. "??????に ???あれ"
To reveal the sacred text, defeat the White Imp at the Eternal Ice Field and the Dark Sylph at the Frosty Floes.

169850.<pc>は 万象流転の書を読んだ。\n<br>\n『静かな蒼穹のほほえみ』の神聖:
"The Book of Transfiguration... "Unveil the sacred secrets of The Silent Azure Smile..." The Sacrament of the Storm Realm... Signs of
peace can be found in the lower reaches of the Windswept Plains...

169851.<pc>は 万象流転の書を読んだ。\n<br>\n『嵐なき森に佇む獣の王』の神聖:
...the Book of Transfiguration... "Reveal the sacred text of The King of Beasts in the Stormless Forest..." "Amakamushka is the path
to the upper levels of the Forest of the Divine Beasts... Amakamushka, the forest of the divine beasts...

169852.<pc>は 万象流転の書を読んだ。\n<br>\n『天かける七色の橋』の神聖秘文:
"The Book of Transfiguration"... "Unlock the sacred secrets of the Seven Colored Bridge to Heaven..." The Sacrament of the Realm of
Fire... Signs of mercy are found on the summit of Mount Phesarias, the home of the sacred bird...

169853.<pc>は 万象流転の書を読んだ。\n<br>\n『炎うず巻く聖なる鳥』の神聖秘:
"The Book of Transfiguration"... "Unravel the sacred text of The Flaming Sacred Bird." The divine beast that guards the Flame Realm...
The sacred bird is located on the hill of the Flame Tree, in the south...

169854.<pc>は 万象流転の書を読んだ。\n<br>\n『悦びの浮き島』の神聖秘文を\:
"The Book of Transfiguration"... "Unlock the sacred secrets of the Floating Islands of Pleasure." Signs of Ecstasy... "Signs of
pleasure float in the lowest depths of Carrel's ice and snow cave, in an underground lake.

169855.<pc>は 万象流転の書を読んだ。\n<br>\n『氷にまぎれし聖なる者』の神聖:
...the Book of Transfiguration. "Unlock the sacred secrets of The Sacred One in the Ice." The divine beast that guards the realm of
ice... He is from the Garden of Blessings, near the center.

169856.<pc>は 万象流転の書を読んだ。\n<br>\n『水底にたゆたうもの』の神聖秘:
read the Book of All Things.
Ye who have solved the sacred text in the "Undersea Dwellers".
The sacrament of the Water Realm shall be found in the depths of the Orfine Seabed to the south, near the hidden oceanic trench.

169857.<pc>は 万象流転の書を読んだ。\n<br>\n『水しぶき舞う海の精』の神聖秘:
read the Book of All Things.
Ye who have solved the sacred text in the "Splashing Sea Spirit".
Kashal, the Divine Beast, protector of the Water Realm, seems to appear in the north side of the Orfine Sea. Swimming around a Tower...

169858.<pc>は 万象流転の書を読んだ。\n<br>\n『輝ける生命の群生』の神聖秘文:
read the Book of All Things.
Ye who have solved the sacred text in the "Swarm of Life".
The sacrament of the Dark Realm shall be found in the upper reaches of the Vale of Shadow.

169859.<pc>は 万象流転の書を読んだ。\n<br>\n『闇に唄う白面の隠者』の神聖秘:
"The Book of Transfiguration... "Unlock the sacred scrolls of The White Maiden Who Sang in the Dark." The divine beast that guards
the Dark Realm... Pachatica is a dark prison, a path leading north from the remains of the disk.
